Release notes release/0.7
=========================

Released 2018-04-30

~~~~~~~

-  Merge pull request #61 from miraculixx/patrick/deploy-jupyterhub

-  added tutorial
   `bf2162f <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/bf2162f>`__
-  finalize deployment particularities on dokku
   `3ef8223 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/3ef8223>`__

   `4dffb7d <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/4dffb7d>`__
-  deploy omjobs
   `1fb81f5 <https://github.com/omegaml/omegaml/commit/1fb81f5>`__
